room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Had an absolute BLAST!  Our family did the Island Escape.  Sadly we didn't make it out in time but we had so much fun.  We were celebrating my brother-in-law's birthday so there were 7 of us in the room.  Literally you walk in and there were clues but nothing else.  You really have to use your mind to figure out that everything in the room is a clue.Our family has decided we are going to do this on a regular basis.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: This was a great time, we had so much fun and can't wait to try another room!! We did the Island room and for being all in one room it was still better than ones we tried before! Mike was so much fun as our game master.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We had a great time doin Island Escape! Fabulous staff!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: First timers. We did the Island Escape as a family event and had a great time working together to solve the clues. We will be back! Game Master Logan was great at helping us out!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: What a blast! Just came home from Breakout and the Island Escape room. Unfortunately we didn't make it in time - we were only three puzzles away. Logan let us finish to see how close we were. Very entertaining, will recommend to friends!
